Uses of Package
com.datamelt.rules.core

  • Packages that use com.datamelt.rules.core 
    Package Description
    com.datamelt.rules.core  
    com.datamelt.rules.core.action  
    com.datamelt.rules.core.util  
    com.datamelt.rules.engine  
    com.datamelt.rules.parser.xml

    com.datamelt.util  
  • Classes in com.datamelt.rules.core used by com.datamelt.rules.core 
    Class and Description
    ActionObject
    a RuleObject identifies an object that will be instantiated and one of its methods will be run.
    Parameter
    represents a class used to store parameters that will be passed to a method using reflection.
    RuleCollection
    collection of rules in the form of XmlRule objects.
    RuleExecutionCollection
    is used to collect the results in form of RuleExecutionResult objects.
    RuleExecutionResult
    this class carries the results of the execution of one rule.
    RuleMessage
    this class is used for the messages that are used for a rule. a rule can have a message in case it fails and one in case it passes.
    RuleMessageCollection
    collection of messages that belong to a rule in form of RuleMessage objects.
    RuleObject
    a RuleObject identifies an object that will be instantiated and one of its methods will be run.
    RuleObjectCollection
    collection of RuleObject objects that are created from parsing the rule definition xml file(s).
    RuleSubGroup 
    RuleSubGroupCollection
    collection of RuleSubGroups which belong to a certain RuleGroup
    XmlAction
    this class holds the information for a specific action as defined in the xml file
    XmlRule
    XmlRule objects are constructed from xml files that describe one or more business rules.
